data.title: how to find a voice claim for an OC? on Toyhouse
data.meta_description: A community for collaborative character creation and trading, worldbuilding and roleplay.
data.text:
one of my ocs has a voice in my head thats kinda vague and i wanna find a solid voice claim for him but i can't :( i know what kind of accent i want for him, but all the reels i found with that's accent are so gruff and deep sounding. i'm not familiar with enough movies/media, and i really don't want to watch a bunch of new york mob movies to find The One /kinda s

how did you all find your voice claims for your OC? do you literally just stumble upon it or do you actively search one out? btw if anyone has any suggestions for a smug new york italian asshole that doesn't have a super deep or gravelly voice it would be very appreciated

I honestly just stumble upon them most often.. Xd

Though, for me, I use music for these voice claims. Since I listen to a lot of music. I also pitch down the sounds so I can get the voice I desire. If I hear a similarity in a song to the voice I imagined, but it's too deep or too high pitched.. I just edit them until I like it.
